title: South American leaders are confronting Israel over its offensive in Gaza
description: Bolivia broke off relations with Israel, Chile and Colombia pulled their ambassadors out of Tel Aviv and Brazil has pleaded for an immediate cease-fire in Gaza.

title: Young progressive Democrats are splitting from the party on Israel
description: The Democratic Party is confronting internal divisions over the special relationship between the U.S. and Israel after the beginning of the Israel-Hamas war exposed political differences.

title: Trump family to take the witness stand in New York civil fraud trial
description: Former President Donald Trump and his three eldest children will testify before a New York judge over the next two weeks.
